trans-unit.target: TEXT_FESHLW2023WITCH_00837_PUMPKIN_000_000<tab>You wish to have words? ...Very well, what would you know?
TEXT_FESHLW2023WITCH_00837_A1_000_003<tab>What is it that you do exactly?
TEXT_FESHLW2023WITCH_00837_PUMPKIN_000_010<tab>Is your memory as fleeting as your lifespan, child? As I told you before, this is my home. You are welcome to come and go as you please.

TEXT_FESHLW2023WITCH_00837_PUMPKIN_000_020<tab>You need ask? My head is not merely for show: I am the archfiend feared and revered since time immemorial. The Great Gourd, who once led legions of darkness...

TEXT_FESHLW2023WITCH_00837_PUMPKIN_000_021<tab>...Is, in fact, merely a title held by those in my coven. Each generation, the knowledge to control denizens of the void is passed down alongside the appellation.
TEXT_FESHLW2023WITCH_00837_PUMPKIN_000_030<tab>I watch. My ancestors once bound the voidsent to their will as a means to wage war, and caused irreparable harm to the world in so doing.

TEXT_FESHLW2023WITCH_00837_PUMPKIN_000_031<tab>Remorseful for their actions, they swore to never be complicit in such a tragedy again. We have watched ever since. Our goal is not to harm the minions of darkness, but to educate them. Show them that peace is an option.
TEXT_FESHLW2023WITCH_00837_PUMPKIN_000_032<tab>But I have spoken enough. I had not realized entertaining a guest could be quite so thrilling...heh heh heh.

TEXT_FESHLW2023WITCH_00837_PUMPKIN_000_033<tab>...I sense you too have formed a pact with a creature of the void. Be very careful, child. Let your guard down for a single moment, and the servant shall become the master.
